name: Dark Cravings
description:
Game titles available in Dark Cravings include:

1. Maid in the Manor
(Victorian horror, cleaning simulator, item-based puzzle, speed run)
Play as a maid hired to clean a haunted manor filled with monsters and supernatural entities.
Will you keep to your own business and leave the cursed place with a handsome pay (for your immaculate cleaning service), or will your curiosity get the best of you?
Caution: This title contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions.

2. My Ex-GF Made Me Dinner
(Psychological horror, food eating simulator, visual novel, conversation)
Your ex-girlfriend came to visit you out of a sudden and unannounced. She is armed with cooking skills that would make anyone drool. What exactly is she up to now? Will you be able to find out her true intention and survive her cooking? Or will you succumb to the horribly delicious dishes being served to you?

3. The House That Eats
(Casual horror, simple puzzle, 2D platformer)
Your house is hungry and it wants to eat. Indulge in a mindless horror of feeding people to your house.

Note: The current version comes with the 3 titles above. The developer plans to make this is an ongoing project, meaning new titles may be added to the collection in the future, with price adjustment accordingly.
